channel.title: CVE Feed for certifi -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for certifi -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-37920|2023-07-25T20:46:04.572Z -- certifi -- python-certifi
item.description: Certifi is a curated collection of Root Certificates for validating the trustworthiness of SSL certificates while verifying the identity of TLS hosts. Certifi prior to version 2023.07.22 recognizes "e-Tugra" root certificates. e-Tugra's root certificates were subject to an investigation prompted by reporting of security issues in their systems. Certifi 2023.07.22 removes root certificates from "e-Tugra" from the root store.
